A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I loved it\, I felt it was the first complete star wars film since Empire\, I love that none of what folks assumed would happen occurs. I see a lot of complaints about Snoke\, he had just as much backstory as Sidious\, did if you cut out the prequels. I had an issue with one subplot\, but I actually loved what they explored with this film.
